A, B, C = map(int, input().split())
print(min(B // A, C))

N, X = map(int, input().split())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(N-1):
    if A[i] + A[i+1] > X: # 今日と明日のカロリーを足したものがxを超えていたら、それを減らす
        count += A[i] + A[i+1] - X
        A[i+1] -= A[i] + A[i+1] - X
print(count)
n, x = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(n - 1):
    if a[i] + a[i + 1] > x:
        count += a[i] + a[i + 1] - x
        a[i + 1] -= a[i] + a[i + 1] - x
print(count)

n, x = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    if a[i] + a[i+1] > x:
        count += a[i] + a[i+1] - x
        a[i+1] -= a[i] + a[i+1] - x
print(count)
n, x = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(n-1):
    if a[i] + a[i+1] > x:
        count += a[i] + a[i+1] - x
        a[i+1] -= a[i] + a[i+1] - x if a[i] + a[i+1] - x < a[i+1] else a[i+1]
print(count)
